title: What is my fps???
body: Hi why does league give me 5-10 fps when my specs are 3.8 gigaherts and 8 go of ram. Do I need to upgrade my video card or what.

replies.body: There could be more common factors like outdated driver and general wear causing drops in fps, so I wouldn't jump to upgrading your video card just yet.  GO over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up and get those frames back.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thank you i fixed the problem much appreciated .
